title: Council Directive 81/1060/EEC of 14 December 1981 derogating in favour of the Kingdom of the Netherlands from Directive 73/403/EEC on the synchronization of general population censuses
header:
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE of 14 December 1981 derogating in favour of the Kingdom of the Netherlands from Directive 73/403/EEC on the synchronization of general population censuses (81/1060/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: By way of derogation, Directive 73/403/EEC shall not apply in the case of the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
This Directive is addressed to the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 December 1981.
For the Council
The President
G. HOWE  (1) OJ No L 347, 17.12.1973, p. 50.
